services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Sessions, Workshops, Talks, MasterClass, Programs.
services.pcard1: Deep changes can be made in each family member as well as the family structure when the entire family participates in therapy. In order to encourage talks that create a pleasant environment and healthy interactions going ahead, I work with others to better understand the dynamics, patterns, and weaknesses of families.
services.pcard2: Individual mental health therapy sessions (sometimes we also call it mental health counseling) are an essential opportunity to process through issues that tend to isolate us. Whether it is a mood disorder, addiction, relationship challenges, trauma, or some other issue keeping you from living your life in a fulfilled way, we will work together to get rid of it.

about.title: About
about.subtitleB: Gestalt Therapist, Systemic Quantic Constellator, Coach.
about.p: Provides support for awareness, self-realization, self-care, self-love, personal development, restoration of balance and emotional, mental, physical and spiritual well-being.
about.p2: Master in Human Development and Behavior.

faqs.title: Constellations
faqs.subtitle: How is a Constellation Developed?
faqs.pcard1: Go to the calendar, schedule the day and time, and make the payment online. The constellation session can last between 45 minutes to approximately 1 hour and 30 minutes.
faqs.pcard1a: Contact me via WhatsApp, where I will ask for your name and date of birth. If you have a specific issue or symptom you want to address, you can let me know here.
faqs.pcard2: If you are clear about the conflict or symptom to be constellated, that's great. If not, we will have a conversation about your present situation, and from there, the issue that is blocking or hurting you will emerge.
faqs.pcard3: There are various ways, depending on how comfortable you feel, either online or in person.
faqs.pcard3a: Individual: Through visualization, figures or dolls, and objects; a physical, real, apparent, or virtual space is set up, and the representatives are placed, creating the constellation.
faqs.pcard3b: Group: This involves a group of people who are in service of your constellation and will represent the matter or those involved in the systemic movement. It can be discreet, meaning if you are not ready to share, that’s okay; only you and I will know what it’s about.
faqs.pcard3c: All forms that exist are transformative and healing; they are simply paths where you feel comfortable with what you are doing, and the energy flows for your highest good.
faqs.pcard4: Movements are made that reflect relationships and family dynamics, whether present, from childhood, ancestral, or transgenerational.
faqs.pcard5: We observe the constellation and identify patterns, loyalties, secrets, and unresolved conflicts.
faqs.pcard6: The facilitator guides the process towards restoring balance in the family system.
faqs.tcard7: 07. The facilitator guides the process towards restoring balance in the family system:
faqs.pcard7h: All this is done through soul healing, to enjoy the beauty of life with genuine joy and to flow lightly, finding your own rhythm.

success.title: Stories of Healing from Our Clients
success.subtitle: Let's resolve your issue, so it can inspire others by joining these success stories.

News.title: Subscribe to our newsletter
News.p1: We care about the protection of your data.

Testi.t1: I want to share with you that psoriasis has improved by 90%, thank you again and a thousand thanks for your love, being available and willing to represent the One who sends you to heal and liberate.
Testi.t2: I am a witness to what you write in the constellation that you made for me, it was healing and liberating to honor my ancestors, accept them, give them their place and let them go, the great influence and impact that they have on my life.
Testi.t3: I am happy with everything that happened in the constellation. And the gift that God gave me this day. Totally grateful, loved Gaby. It still has an impact on what happened. Truthfully I didn't expect anything from this...
